original_title: Ghostride the Whip: The Hyphy Movement
overview: The first film to definitively capture the energy and danger of "Hyphy," the Hip Hop youth movement exploding out of the San Francisco Bay Area. Narrated by Oakland native and television/radio personality Sway, this film explores the political, social and musical history behind the culture that popularized ghostriding the whip - walking, running or dancing next to a moving car with no driver.
tagline: The wildest hip-hop story ever told!
title: Ghostride the Whip: The Hyphy Movement
